attributes.additional_details:
“20 IS PLENTY”
PETITION TO LOWER THE SPEED LIMIT!

Please sign here is you believe 20 mph is fast enough for traffic through Great Rissington.

Speeding traffic and a rapidly-growing school make a dangerous combination. The road between the school and the sports field is hazardous. Little Rissington, on a bigger road with no school, has a 30 mph limit.

Our village, on a smaller road, with a pub, and scores of children coming and going, surely requires a lower limit.

The Highways Department has said “No”.
If you want them to think again and agree that
“20 IS PLENTY”
please sign here

rejection.details: This is a matter for Gloucestershire County Council, as the local highway authority.
